availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gabriel Mark L. Jones (Ballard county farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth Jones. Father of Christina E. Jones, Martin V. Jones, Charles H. Jones, Nancy E. Jones, William Jones, and Marioli A. Jones. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Cobbs District], p. 98.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 4, p. 20
Find A Grave, "Gabriel Jones (1818-1880)," Memorial #123378875, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/123378875/gabriel-jones (accessed February 1, 2018).
